General.Name: Lombard et Medot SA
General.Description: Lombard & Medot SA engages in the production and sale of champagne in France and internationally. It offers champagnes under the Lombard brand. The company was founded in 1925 and is based in Épernay, France. Lombard & Medot SA is a subsidiary of Lombard Holding.

3.Name: Mr. Christophe  Pitois
3.Title: Joint MD of Winemaker & Member of Exec. Board
